TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LoadBalancingSupportedAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Determines whether the component participates in load balancing, if the component load balancing service is installed and enabled on the server.

remarks.format:

Docs.value: if load balancing support is enabled; otherwise, . The default is .
